name: HotelCalifornia
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hotel california
des: Welcome to the Hotel California, a grand yet eerie establishment in 1920s California. As a traveler seeking refuge, you find yourself trapped in a web of mystery, with strange guests, hidden secrets, and surreal experiences awaiting you at every turn. Will you uncover the truth, or will the hotel’s grip hold you forever? Drop us any feedback at support@stokedskills.com. We love to hear from our users!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
